name: Celestial Warden
description:
Celestial Warden is a survival shooter featuring destructible planets, upgradable weapons, and dangerous asteroids. 

Frantic Shooting

Dash around the spherical planet dispatching the impending asteroids. Juggle collection of upgrades and protecting your planet.

Upgrade your laser pistol

Create any weapon type by upgrading certain weapon properties like fire rate or laser speed. Specialize in anything from a wide spread laser shotgun to a long range laser sniper or anything in between!

Survive for as long as possible

The game will get progressively harder over time, increasing the number of asteroids, their size etc. How long can you survive before either your trees are destroyed and you die of lack of oxygen or your planet's core is destroyed?
